pkgmetadata.longdescription: Alluvial Plots in 'ggplot2' // Alluvial plots use x-splines, sometimes augmented with stacked histograms, to visualize multi-dimensional or repeated-measures data with categorical or ordinal variables. They can be viewed as simplified and standardized Sankey diagrams; see Riehmann, Hanfler, and Froehlich (2005) doi:10.1109/INFVIS.2005.1532152 and Rosvall and Bergstrom (2010) doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0008694. This package provides ggplot2 layers to produce alluvial plots from tidy data.
